Method Detail

evaluateHandleNull

public java.lang.Object evaluateHandleNull(java.lang.String expression)
Description copied from interface: ADFExpressionEvaluator
Evaluates the specified value expression against the evaluator's defaul variable resolver.

invokeMethod(String, Object[]) should be used if the expression is a method expression.

Differs from evaluate in that it is guaranteed not to throw a PropertyNotFoundException for null properties.

Specified by:
evaluateHandleNull in interface ADFExpressionEvaluator

                                           javax.servlet.jsp.el.VariableResolver variableResolver)
Description copied from interface: ADFExpressionEvaluator
Evaluates the specified value expression against the specified variable resolver.

invokeMethod(String, Class[], Object[]) should be used if the expression is a method expression.

Differs from evaluate in that it is guaranteed not to throw a PropertyNotFoundException for null properties.
